sentences.en: What happens to the young girls these boys impregnate?
sentences.cn: 这些男孩让少女怀孕后，女孩儿们要承担什么后果呢？

sentences.en: Or impregnate her, depending on which version you read.
sentences.cn: 或者使她怀孕了，取决于你读的哪个版本。

sentences.en: The purpose of the marinade is to impregnate foods with the flavour of the ingredients.
sentences.cn: 使用腌泡汁的目的是使配料的味道浸透到食物中去。
